__e: Couldn't we just have rice cakes for breakfast?
I'm sorry... but someone brought rice cakes for the New Year, so I thought of sharing some with you
But wasn't he going to feed me rice dumplings?
I think we were having meatloaf for dinner.
I mean, nobody wants to buy brownies from somebody that says "um" and "like."
I don't have an idea, but I am two brownies away from getting my dad to admit he loved my mom.
Not until you eat these and tell me what you think.
Some chick has baked homemade muffins and left them on my doorstep - this is not good.
My mom and I had made cupcackes, and my dad was... Well, he was in his usual place.
Eh, uh, those dumplings are for Mom.
Dumplings are important to you than me?
We're done here, and for the record, your wontons are way too big.
Would a thousand dollars cover it? Now thatyou have no more muffins to sell, perhaps you'd join me for dinner?
Oh, well, I guess I'll just have to bring him some cupcakes.
I just wanted to make some cupcakes for my friends, you know, maybe make a few bucks on the side.
